title: TastePreferenceRequest
description: Defines the structure for a user's travel and taste preferences to generate a TasteTrail itinerary.

budget.description: The total budget for the trip in a standard currency (e.g., USD).

trip_length.description: The duration of the trip in a whole number of days.

destination_city.description: The target city for the trip (e.g., 'Tokyo').

destination_country.description: The target country for the trip (e.g., 'Japan').

likes.description: A list of cultural preferences, interests, artists, food types, etc., that the user enjoys.

dislikes.description: An optional list of things the user wants to avoid.
